lines.text: [after Randi sucks all the blood out of a customer]
Randi, did I say you could break for lunch?
Won't you get tired of spending eternity listening to her whine about not getting the right Barbie doll for her eighth birthday?
What kind of a freak ARE you?
I'm sorry I wrecked your car, I'm sorry I maxed out your credit card, I'm sorry I slept with Tina!
Without the gore, it's a bore.
I'm sorry, Angel, it's a vampire thing.
This guy is lewd, crude... and about to be food.
